headline: Will Morgan Stanley’s Upgrade and Silvus Integration Shift Motorola Solutions’ (MSI) Public Safety Tech Narrative?
summary: Morgan Stanley recently upgraded Motorola Solutions to Overweight from Equal Weight after a valuation reset, as the company advances its integration of Silvus Technologies to bolster secure wireless radio communications for public safety, government, and defense customers. This combination of a more favorable analyst stance and deeper exposure to secure communications for high-priority government use cases could reshape how investors assess Motorola Solutions’ long-term role in public safety...
